price: Ɔsomafoͻ no nso bεka sε: ”Me Wura Nyankopͻn, nokorε sε, me nkorͻfoͻ no yii wͻn ani frii Qur’aan yi so”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
